en_first_half: Koen is an asshole, in the most delicious and entertaining of ways. He seems
en_second_half: to have distinct preferences, strong opinions, and little interest in keeping either to himself.
en_results_raw: completely oblivious to the chaos he creates, often leaving a trail of laughter and confusion in his wake. His antics are a constant source of amusement for those around him, and his infectious enthusiasm is impossible to resist. Despite his questionable behavior, Koen's heart is in the right place, and his genuine passion for life is undeniable. As a result, his friends and acquaintances can't help but be drawn to his charismatic personality, even if they can't quite figure out what he's thinking next.
